1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Umm Qais bin Mihsan narrated:"I entered upon the Prophet with a son of mine who was not yet eating food. He urinated on him, so he called for water which he sprinkled over it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي نَضْحِ بَوْلِ الْغُلاَمِ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَطْعَمَ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About Sprinkling Water On The Urine Of Young Boy Before (He reaches The Age That) He Eats Food
